files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.BaseClasses.RelmIndexBase
files.Summary: Specifies index configuration metadata for a class, struct, or property to control how an index is created and managed in the underlying data store.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.BaseClasses.RelmIndexColumnBase
files.Summary: Represents a key definition for an index column, including optional length, expression, and sort direction settings.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmColumn
files.Summary: Specifies metadata for a database column, including its name, size, constraints, and other properties.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmDataLoader
files.Summary: Specifies metadata for associating a data loader with a property, struct, or class.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmDatabase
files.Summary: Specifies that a class or struct represents a database entity and associates it with a database name.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmDto
files.Summary: Specifies that the associated property or struct is part of a Data Transfer Object (DTO) used for communication between application layers or services.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmForeignKey
files.Summary: Specifies a foreign key relationship for a property or struct in a data model.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmIndex<T>
files.Summary: Specifies that the decorated class or struct should have an index created on the specified properties when used with a Relm database.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmIndex
files.Summary: Non-keyed Relm index attribute for indexes that do not need to be paired with others.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmIndexColumn<T>
files.Summary: Represents a key definition for an index column, including optional length, expression, and sort direction settings.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmIndexNamed
files.Summary: Non-keyed simple Relm index attribute for indexes only name columns and index properties, but don't need any per-column settings.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmKey
files.Summary: Specifies that the associated property or struct is a key used for identifying or referencing entities.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmTable
files.Summary: Specifies that a class or struct represents a table in a relational database and provides the name of the table.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmTrigger
files.Summary: Specifies a trigger configuration for a property or struct, defining when and how a trigger should be executed within the Relm framework.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Attributes.RelmUnique
files.Summary: Specifies that the decorated class or struct must have a compound unique index for the named properties. Useful when making a unique index and only want to specify the properties that are part of the unique index without needing to specify all the other parameters of the RelmIndex attribute. This is intended for use with the Relm object database.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Enums.Commands.Command
files.Summary: Represents the set of commands that can be used to define and manipulate query operations.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Enums.Commands
files.Summary: Represents a collection of commands that can be used to define and manipulate query operations.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Enums.Triggers.TriggerEvent
files.Summary: Specifies the type of database operation that can trigger an event.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Enums.Triggers.TriggerOrdering
files.Summary: Specifies the relative ordering of triggers in a sequence.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Enums.Triggers.TriggerTime
files.Summary: Specifies when an action or event is triggered relative to a particular operation.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Enums.Triggers.TriggerTypes
files.Summary: Specifies the types of triggers that can be executed in response to database operations.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Enums.Triggers
files.Summary: Represents a collection of database trigger types that define actions to be executed before or after specific data modification operations.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Extensions.DbContextExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for configuring and interacting with database contexts.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Extensions.ListExtensions
files.Summary: Provides a set of extension methods for performing database operations, loading related data, and manipulating collections in the context of relational models.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.IRelmContext
files.Summary: Defines a context for interacting with a Relm database, providing methods for managing connections, transactions, and data operations. This interface supports querying, data manipulation, and bulk operations while ensuring proper resource management.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.IRelmDataLoader<T>
files.Summary: Defines methods and properties for loading, writing, and managing data, as well as executing commands with associated expressions.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.IRelmDataSet<T>
files.Summary: Represents a strongly-typed, queryable, and updatable collection of data model entities, providing advanced data loading, filtering, and manipulation capabilities.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.IRelmDataSetBase
files.Summary: Base interface for Relm data sets.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.IRelmExecutionCommand
files.Summary: Defines the contract for an execution command within the Relm framework, providing access to the initial command and expression, management of additional commands, and options for foreign key navigation.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.IRelmFieldLoader
files.Summary: Defines a contract for loading field data within a Relm context.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.IRelmFieldLoaderBase
files.Summary: Defines the contract for loading field data based on key values in a data source.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.IRelmMember
files.Summary: Defines the contract for a member entity used in aparmenting within the Relm system, including identification, contact information, and value accessors.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.IRelmModel
files.Summary: Defines the contract for a Relm-compatible model, providing properties and methods for managing entity state, database interactions, and data transfer object (DTO) generation.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.IRelmModelApartment
files.Summary: Represents an apartment entity within the Relm model, including associated user and membership information.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.RelmQuick.IRelmQuickContext
files.Summary: Defines a context for interacting with a Relm database, providing methods for managing connections, transactions, and data operations. This interface supports querying, data manipulation, and bulk operations while ensuring proper resource management.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.RelmQuick.IRelmQuickFieldLoader
files.Summary: Provides access to the field loading quick context for use with RELM field loaders.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.Resolvers.IRelmResolverBase
files.Summary: Defines methods for obtaining a database connection string builder based on a specified connection type or connection string.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Interfaces.Resolvers.IRelmResolver_MySQL
files.Summary: Defines methods for obtaining MySQL connection string builders based on connection type, name, or raw connection string.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Models.EventArguments.DtoEventArgs
files.Summary: Provides event data that includes additional object properties for data transfer operations.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Models.RelmContext
files.Summary: Provides a context for managing database connections, transactions, and data sets within the Relm data access layer. Enables querying, updating, and bulk operations on relational data models using configurable options and connection strategies.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Models.RelmDataSet<T>
files.Summary: Represents a dataset that provides functionality for managing, querying, and persisting a collection of entities of type T.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Models.RelmDefaultDataLoader<T>
files.Summary: Provides a default implementation of the interface for loading, querying, and writing data for a specified model type. This class is designed to work with models that implement the interface.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Models.RelmExecutionCommand
files.Summary: Represents a command and its associated expression for execution within the Relm framework, supporting additional and child commands for complex execution scenarios.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Models.RelmModel
files.Summary: Represents a base model for entities in the Relm framework, providing core attributes and functionality for data manipulation, database operations, and DTO generation.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Models.RelmModelApartment
files.Summary: Represents an apartment entity within the Relm data model, including user and member association information.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Models.RelmQuickContext
files.Summary: Provides a quick-start context for working with Relm data models and MySQL database connections, supporting configuration, data set management, and transactional operations.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Models.RelmTrigger<T>
files.Summary: Represents a database trigger associated with a specific table and operation type.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Options.RelmContextOptionsBuilder.OptionsBuilderTypes
files.Summary: Specifies the types of options that can be used to configure a database context using an options builder.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Options.RelmContextOptionsBuilder
files.Summary: Provides a builder for configuring options required to establish a connection to a relational database context. Supports multiple initialization patterns, including connection strings, named connections, and open MySQL connections.

files.Title: CoreRelm.Persistence.BulkTableWriter<T>
files.Summary: Provides functionality for performing high-performance bulk insert operations into a database table with configurable options for batching, transactions, error handling, and column mapping.

files.Title: CoreRelm.RelmHelper
files.Summary: Provides a collection of helper methods and properties for interacting with relational databases.

files.Title: CoreRelm.RelmInternal.Models.ForeignKeyNavigationOptions
files.Summary: Class to hold foreign key navigation options, used internally by CoreRelm to manage relationships between models.

files.Title: SimpleRelm.Attributes.RelmColumn
files.Summary: Specifies metadata for a database column, including its name, size, constraints, and other properties.

files.Title: SimpleRelm.Attributes.RelmDataLoader
files.Summary: Specifies metadata for associating a data loader with a property, struct, or class.

files.Summary: Specifies that a class or struct represents a table in a relational database and provides the name of the table.
